intro:
Firm noodles! Dashi! Tempura!
Fill udon orders as quickly as possible and follow the road to mastery!
description:
Let's make authentic udon on the Nintendo Switch™!
Whip up bowls of udon noodles both hot and cold as quickly and accurately as you can!
Share Joy-Con™ for exciting battles with up to 4 players!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make and serve as many bowls of udon as you can before time runs out!
Boil the noodles, pour the broth, then add the right toppings!
Don't forget to watch the portion sizes, and fill each order correctly!

《How to Play》
1. Check the order - Memorize the udon type and amount of noodles!

2. Boil the noodles - Be careful not to mess up the amount!

3. Rinse the boiled noodles - Blanch them when making hot udon!

4. Add the toppings - Tempura, green onions, fried tofu, and more—just follow the order!

5. Serve it up - Get the order correct for the most points!

[Score Attack]
Compete with players from all over the world for the top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Compete with others and test your udon-making skills!
